# title

**Instance Property**

The localized title shown to the user.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String? { get }
```

## Getting the Identifier and Title

- **identifier**: The identifier for the user notification action.

items.description: The identifier for the user notification action.
items.name: identifier

title: title
